price: (3) Indeed, We sent it down during a blessed night.[1459] Indeed, We were to warn [mankind].
arabic: إِنَّآ أَنزَلۡنَٰهُ فِي لَيۡلَةٖ مُّبَٰرَكَةٍۚ إِنَّا كُنَّا مُنذِرِينَ
footnotes: [1459]- The Night of Decree (Qadr). See Sūrah al-Qadr.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International

meta.transliteration: innā anzalnāhu fī laylatin mubārakatin innā kunnā mundhirīna
